name: RC Pilot Trainer
summary:
Experience the thrill of R/C airplane flying! 
This simulator puts you in control of a highly realistic airplane or helicopter in a beautifully rendered environment, recreating the precision and excitement of line-of-sight flying. Perfect for beginners and seasoned pilots alike, this VR experience offers a unique way to enjoy R/C flight, rain or shine.

Practice alone, or learn from others in online multiplayer.

Design, build and fly your own designs and learn about the physics of flight.

Seasoned...
